name: TNC (Totaly Not Carrom!)
description:
TNC (Totaly Not Carrom!)

TNC (Totaly Not Carrom!) is a puzzle based hyper casual mobile game, where you need to slide the puck into another puck to the hole

The team:
Abdulaziz Alrasheed (Game Developer)
Sultan Alsubaie (Graphic Designer)
Abdullah Alhejji (Game Producer)
Fawaz Ishaq (3D Artist)

Abdullah Alothman (Level Designer)

Saud Aljuwayi (Business & Marketing)
